titleStmt.title: Triumphus hymenæus, A panegyrick to the King and Queen's most Sacred Majestie, vpon their ever to be remembred most glorious passing upon the river of Thames, coming from Hampton-Court to White-Hall, August the 23d, 1662 ... as it was presented to both Their Majesties by William Austin, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Austin, William, fl. 1662.

titleStmt.title: Triumphus hymenæus, A panegyrick to the King and Queen's most Sacred Majestie, vpon their ever to be remembred most glorious passing upon the river of Thames, coming from Hampton-Court to White-Hall, August the 23d, 1662 ... as it was presented to both Their Majesties by William Austin, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Austin, William, fl. 1662.

notesStmt.note: Also present is an added t.p., without imprint, with title: Triumphus hymenæus, Londons solemn jubile ... / by William Austin, Esq.
